headline: What Kroger (KR)'s Expanded Instacart Partnership and AI Shopping Tools Mean for Shareholders
summary: In early November 2025, Kroger announced an expanded partnership with Instacart, reaffirming Instacart as its primary delivery fulfillment partner for nearly 2,700 stores across more than 20 banners, and introducing Instacart’s AI-powered Cart Assistant for personalized shopping and meal planning on the Kroger iOS app. This move signals Kroger’s intent to drive convenience and digital engagement, while introducing new ways to connect brands with customers through advanced retail media and AI...
